title: Vuelta a España Stage 5: Bike-Throw Makes the Difference as Pavel Bittner Denies Wout van Aert
content:
DSM Firmenich-PostNL's rising sprinter scoops career-topping win in photo finish as Roglič home safe resplendent in red.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España Stage 5: Bike-Throw Makes the Difference as Pavel Bittner Denies Wout van Aert on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
